item.title: Guacamole
item.description: Prep Cook Serves 30 min – 4 Ingredients 3 avocados, mashed 1 lime, juiced 1 tsp salt 1/2 cup diced onion 3 tbsp chopped cilantro 2 roma tomatoes, diced 1 tsp minced garlic 1 pinch cayenne pepper (optional) Steps Mash and mix everything together. Serve immediately. Notes Holds in fridge for about 3 days before it starts turning weird colors.
